resources.string: Welcome to the Name Entry App.\nHit the back button to enter another name.

This application is meant to be a digital gallery of Washington State Hikes, while also allowing a user to keep a journal of their adventures. While the application is in its early development, here are the overall goals of the application.

1. Have a database of Washington state hikes for user to view. 
2. Allow users to add a hike to their journal. 
3. Allow users to use camera to document a hike. 
4. Use gps to track distance and record exact route.
Wear well-fitting and broken-in hiking boots to avoid discomfort and injury.
